Hágasela pruebay recibatratamientoLleveestatarjetaa sumédico, clínica, o a una clínicade ETS del Condadode Los Ángeleshoy.Para másinformación, referenciasa clínica, o condones gratis, llamea la líneainformativade ETS 1-800-758-0880o visiteGetProtectedLA.com.For doctor or nurse:The person with this card has been exposed to gonorrhea.  The CDC recommends sexual contacts to chlamydia be treated presumptively with:Ceftriaxone 500mg IM in single dose (preferred)-OR -Cefixime800mg orallyin single doseTesting for chlamydia, syphilis, and HIV is also recommended. For completed CDC treatment guidelines and other STD information, visit www.publichealth.lacounty.gov/dhsp/InfoForProviders.htm
Revised: 03/2022
